titleStmt.title: The fierce and cruel battaile fought by the three Kings in Barbarie, nere to the cittie of Maroques, the 25. of Aprill last. 1607

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde?] for Thomas Archer, and are to be sold at his shop in the Popes-head-Pallace, nere the Royall-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Popes-head-Pallace, nere the Royall-Exchange
